page.title: 15RECREATION IN MARKFIELD
page.content: PODDY At school I like playing poddy. I will tell you how to play it. First you need three or more players. One of them is on and can count to as many as you want.When the counter sees one of the runners the counter runs back to the post and shouts 'Poddy one two three Francis' and Francis is out.But if by chance the other runner gets to the post before the counter does and shouts 'Free all'all the other runners are free and the counter counts again.Poddy is a popular game. HIDE AND SEEK First of all someone is chosen to count while the others hide.When they have finished they go and look for the people who are hiding.When everyone has been found the game is repeated with the person who was first found as the counter.
